name: Auth & RBAC
description: Authentication and role-based access control with Owner/Super/CrewLead/Crew roles and SMS magic codes for crew members.

prd.problemStatement: Secure access control requires proper authentication and role-based permissions. SMS magic codes enable frictionless crew access without passwords.

successMetrics.metric: Crew login success rate via SMS

userStories: As an owner, I want role-based access so that I can control who sees what
As a crew member, I want SMS login so that I can access the system without remembering passwords
